QuestData.Title: Into the Hive
QuestData.Description:
Whatever toxin has infested this creche is potent enough to take down our best healers.
That does not bode well for either one of us, $n.
No matter. Dracthyr are trapped inside. We are going in, regardless of risk.
Take a deep breath and follow me!
QuestData.RewardText:
Good. You are awake.
<Viridia coughs to clear her throat.>
We need an evoker's skills right now.
